actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat certain charges for waste treatment services as deductible State or local taxes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to treat as deductible State or local real property taxes State or local charges for waste treatment services necessitated by requirements of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat certain charges for waste treatment services as deductible State or local taxes.
